channel.title: Changing the background
channel.description: When i open the sprites I cant seem to find it, it should look like this right? But i cant seem to find it.. [IMG]http://i1024.photobucket.com/albums/y307/pvp_owner/Capture4.png[/img]

item.title: Changing the background
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“Lil wayne fan, post:8, topic:417485”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=520042.msg3776226#msg3776226 date=1318118433]
The Help Section is to teach you how to fix your problem, so you can fix any other related problems you may have in the present or future.

TeamViewer does it for you, and that is not what the Help Section is for.

Post in Client Help, the folks over there might be able to help solve the problem better than the server related guys can.

Good luck.
[/quote]

Your english is quite well, and iv already posted there but no one has even looked at it and this i posted before i knew the other one and i just thought to check up on here and maybe get help?[/quote]

Patience is the key to success. Of course, not all problems get solved, and there are ways to fix that.

You can view other people’s difficulties and check if you had the same issue. The search bar is your best friend with this fix’it.

You can also ask a good helper if you find any in the help sections.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the background
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

It’s not in sprites,
go into your client folder and just type the name “edge4pk” in the searchfield
it will show u all the files where the name is used;
replace them all with yours and compile
should work

note: this is delta
if its PI I think u need to use zfilesearcher

Read full topic
